snippet: Paramount said it had acquired the distribution rights to "Cirque du Soleil Worlds Away," a 3-D movie written and directed by Andrew Adamson (of the "Shrek" and "Narnia" franchises), and whose producers include James Cameron.
abstract: Paramount said it had acquired the distribution rights to "Cirque du Soleil Worlds Away," a 3-D movie written and directed by Andrew Adamson (of the "Shrek" and "Narnia" franchises), and whose producers include James Cameron.

headline.main: Cirque du Soleil 3-D Movie Coming at You This Year
